author: seungjin-yang
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37341. This PR adds DQM modules (`GEMCSCSegmentSource` and `GEMCSCSegmentClient`) to monitor GE1/1 detection efficiency using `GEMCSCSegment` in the online DQM.

#### PR validation:
This PR was tested with the following recipe on lxplus.
```bash
cmsrel CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-04-06-2300
cd CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-04-06-2300/src
cmsenv
git-cms-merge-topic seungjin-yang:GEMEffByGEMCSCSegment__from-CMSSW_12_3_X_2022-04-06-2300
scram b -j4
cmsRun ${CMSSW_BASE}/src/DQM/Integration/python/clients/gem_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py unitTest=True
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37341. I need a backport to 12_3_X for April collision runs
title: Add GE1/1 detection efficiency monitor using GEMCSCSegment (backport of #37178, 12_3_X)
